sense.gloss: to run (of liquid), to spread, to bleed, to blot
to blur, to blot, to be blurred
to ooze, to well up (of tears, etc.)
to show through (of feelings, emotions, etc.), to reveal itself

sdata.j: ↑急↑↓きゅう↓|にジム|は↑銀行↑↓ぎんこう↓の↑前↑↓まえ↓で↑車↑↓くるま↓を↑止↑↓と↓めた。
sdata.e: Suddenly Jim pulled the car up in front of the bank.

sdata.j: ↑家↑↓いえ↓で↑洗濯↑↓せんたく↓すると↑色↑↓いろ↓が|にじむ|。
sdata.e: If you wash it at home, the color will run.

sdata.j: ↑病気↑↓びょうき↓のため|にジム|は↑会合↑↓かいごう↓に↑出席↑↓しゅっせき↓できなかった。
sdata.e: Illness prevented Jim from attending the meeting.
